Name: New Year Luck
RuleTitle:
Guaranteed reward: BC x30
1. Get one of the followings if you draw "Great":
Serum Bundle (M) x1 
 Minor Overclock Alloy x3 
 Memory Overclock Circuit I x3 
Weapon Overclock Core Ix3
Cogs x50000
2. Get one of the followings if you draw "Good":
Serum Bundle (S) x1
Minor Overclock Alloy x2
Memory Overclock Circuit I  x2
Weapon Overclock Core I x2
Cogs x30000
Get one of the followings if you draw "Very Good":
Serum Bundle (S) x1
Minor Overclock Alloy x1
Memory Overclock Circuit I  x1
Weapon Overclock Core I x1
Cogs x20000
